titles: Of bodies and of mans soul to discover the immortality of reasonable souls : with two discourses, Of the powder of sympathy, and, Of the vegetation of plants / by Sir Kenelm Digby, Knight.
author: Digby, Kenelm, Sir, 1603-1665.
publisher: Printed by S.G. and B.G. for John Williams ...,
notes: Vol. 2 has title: Second treatise, declaring the nature and operations of mans soul, out of which the immortality of reasonable souls is convinced. London : 1669.
The two discourses with special title pages are lacking on film.
Reproduction of original in Library of Congress.
